qas.question: What is the largest dam ever built in the world?
On which river is the Three Gorges Dam built?
What is the purpose of the Three Gorges Dam?

answers.text: to control flooding in the Sichuan Basin, neighboring Yunnan province, and downstream

qas.question: What are some reasons for the opposition of the Three Gorges Dam?

answers.text: massive resettlement of residents in the reservoir areas, loss of archeological sites, and ecological damages.

qas.question: What is the second largest damn in China?

plausible_answers.text: to control flooding in the Sichuan Basin, neighboring Yunnan province, and downstream

qas.question: What is the purpose of the resettlement of residents?

plausible_answers.text: massive resettlement of residents in the reservoir areas, loss of archeological sites, and ecological damages

qas.question: What are some reasons for the opposition of the alternative energy sources?
What on the Yangtze River is being damaged?

context: <b4_0><b5_0><b6_0><b7_0><b11_0>The <a0_0>Three Gorges Dam<b11_0/><b7_0/><b6_0/><b5_0/><b4_0/><a0_0/>, the largest dam ever constructed, is being built on the <a1_0><b8_0>Yangtze River<b8_0/><a1_0/> in nearby Hubei province <a2_0><b9_0>to control flooding in the Sichuan Basin, neighboring Yunnan province, and downstream<b9_0/><a2_0/>. The plan is hailed by some as China's efforts to shift towards alternative energy sources and to further develop its industrial and commercial bases, but others have criticised it for its potentially harmful effects, such as <a3_0><b10_0>massive resettlement of residents in the reservoir areas, loss of archeological sites, and ecological damages<b10_0/>.
